creator: Glitched Rocket Launcher Studios
descriptionHtml:
An Asteroids-style game but with a modern and exciting twist. There are tons of upgrades and customization to help destroy those pesky asteroids and their A.I. controlled enemy ships.

Blast those asteroids out of existence with 10 unique weapons
The classic laser.
A magical mage orb.
Everyone's favorite shotgun.
A flamethrower in space, A Spacethrower!
And a rocket launcher for when things get serious!

But that's not all we've got, because Incase you need some backup we've got
Mega Lasers to track your foes.
Mini grenades for those fast explosions.
Cannons for obliterating those pesky asteroid clumps.
We've got your power-hungry single-shot missiles!
And last but not least, a burst missile to really run through your foes!

There's plenty of upgrading to be done, and plenty of asteroids to destroy!
So what will your High score be?
descriptionShort: A classic action-filled game with modern customization and endless possibility

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Many updated UI and mechanics full details are on the forums.


*New* Website
All suggestions go to Pyrorobotxt@gmail.com
I will do my best to implement any ideas given
I hope you all enjoy Phantom Asteroids and have an amazing day
- The Dev

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hey everyone, I'll be honest I don't remember what all I did over this last update but, it's been a while since I was actually able to upload, and finally I am able to (hopefully) let more people play the game since the last update before this I accidentally closed it to only people with the newest OS.

All suggestions go to Pyrorobotxt@gmail.com
I will do my best to implement any ideas given
I hope you all enjoy Phantom Asteroids and have an amazing day
- The Dev

title: Phantom Asteroids

creator: Glitched Rocket Launcher Studios
descriptionHtml:
An Asteroids-style game but with a modern and exciting twist. There are tons of upgrades and customization to help destroy those pesky asteroids and their A.I. controlled enemy ships.

Blast those asteroids out of existence with 10 unique weapons
The classic laser.
A magical mage orb.
Everyone's favorite shotgun.
A flamethrower in space, A Spacethrower!
And a rocket launcher for when things get serious!

But that's not all we've got!
Mega Lasers with pinpoint accuracy to melt through your foes!
Mini grenades for some fast explosions.

We've got your power-hungry single-shot missiles!
And last but not least, a burst missile to really run through your foes!

So what will your High score be?

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
A quick update after I found that I had caused the light upgrades to freeze the game, luckily that was simple to fix, but I had a bunch of other things that magically pilled up and as such had to fix those, and I have now! Huzzah!

All suggestions go to our forums at https://groups.google.com/g/guardians-of-ironstar-forum (Assuming it is working as intended)
I will do my best to implement any ideas given
I hope you all enjoy Phantom Asteroids and have an amazing day
- The Dev

title: Phantom Asteroids

creator: Glitched Rocket Launcher Studios
descriptionHtml:
A bullet-hell style game but with an in-depth and exciting twist. There are tons of upgrades and customization to help destroy those pesky asteroids and the giant mega-ships that will surely crush you!

Blast those asteroids out of existence with 10 unique weapons
The classic Laser, this one is not for mining though.
The mage's old magical Mage Orb.
The trusty scrap Shotgun.
A Flamethrower in SPACE, a Spacethrower!
The Rocket Launcher is here for when things get serious!


And when you need more, the reinforcements arrive!

Use a Mega Laser with pinpoint accuracy to melt through your foes!
Sprinkle some mini grenades to pepper the enemy.
BOOM The cannon has the power to wipe out an entire group with ease!
Target acquired, firing the single-shot missile!
Targets locked launching burst missiles for maximum effect!



There's plenty of upgrading to be done, and plenty of asteroids to destroy!

So what will your High score be?


while this might break the cool description, I want to put a public note in here. This game is currently developed by one person as a hobby. I understand there is probably plenty of issues, from visual scaling or minor bugs here and there. I try my best to make this game as fun as possible, and I would love to hear both your suggestions and bug reports because when things are pointed out to help make the game more enjoyable for everyone, it makes me very happy that people can have fun, and I can help make that fun better for them! Either way, happy gameplay everyone.
descriptionShort: A classic action-filled game with modern customization and endless playability!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Well I found out how to use sprites and sprite sheets, and how to make them. So I went and replaced all the raw images with sprite versions.

All patch notes can once again be found on the Wix website for Phantom Asteroids. Since it was easier to make forums on there.

All suggestions go to our forums at https://pyrorobotxt.wixsite.com/phantom-asteroids/forum/patch-notes
I will do my best to implement any ideas given
I hope you all enjoy Phantom Asteroids and have an amazing day
- The Dev

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Sorry everyone for disapearing for a while, college has been wild, but I'm back to working on this! Enjoy everyone!
Added a volume slider
Moved Active-Unactive weapon buttons to the bottom right instead of center
Revamped the terrible state of “the book of knowledge” so instructions/help may be better
Cleaned up assets
Added crate sprite chart, for no useable reason
Removed the excess boss text references
Upped api level so it should work on Google Pixel 6 and such

title: Phantom Asteroids
